titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning the sauing of fuell, materials, labour, and lessening the great annoyance of smoake.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Forbidding the infringement on a patent for a fuel-efficient furnace given to Thorneff Francke.
Dated at end: Greenewich this twenty fift day of Iune, in the tenth yeere of our reigne.
Arms 21; Steele notation: Francke, ties 2) Whittaker things.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and
